name: mobidv
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)), wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Formula-building rule for the at-most-one quantifier (deduction form). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.) Reduce axiom dependencies and shorten proof. (Revised by BJ, 7-Oct-2022.)
